title: Border, early–mid-17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique:
-8-element flat braid bent and folded to define plants and the rounded tabs
-Braid edged by buttonhole stitch and decorated by picots
-Wrapping and buttonhole stitch over a cord for connecting bars
-Needle-made fillings
-Trimming
